meanings.sent1: She always misedits her essays by forgetting to check for mistakes.
meanings.sent2: I misedit the photo and accidentally cropped out the main subject.
meanings.sent3: The teacher misedited the answer key, causing confusion among the students.
meanings.sent4: His tendency to misedit emails led to misunderstandings with his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The new intern tends to misedit documents, so we need to double-check her work.

meanings.definition: An instance of editing something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The misedit in the article changed the entire meaning of the paragraph.
meanings.sent2: I found a misedit in the final draft of the report that needed correction.
meanings.sent3: The misedit in the video made it unintentionally hilarious.
meanings.sent4: Her misedit of the spreadsheet caused errors in the calculations.
meanings.sent5: The misedit on the poster was so obvious that it made everyone laugh.
